column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////i was in chicago on business.  the first thing we did when we got off the plan and at the car rental place
column2: was asked the locals where we should go for deep dish.  everyone said you gotta check out lou malnatis.  and
column4: we were not disappointing.  i personally love deep dish - pizza should not be done any other way! and this place has great heaping amount of cheese.
